entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
